content: 6 sts in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat *to* 2 more times double_crochet in next 6 sts fptr2tog around previous and next fptr working behind fptr skip next st half_double_crochet in next 8 sts to get a neater look join to first half_double_crochet fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 11 half_double_crochet 16 double_crochet 2 fptr2tog 1 chain-2 space 9 join with a standing double_crochet in any chain-2 space double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space *skip next hidden st double_crochet in next 7 sts fpdc around fptr2tog half_double_crochet in next 11 sts fpdc around fptr2tog double_crochet in next 8 sts in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last corner group join to standing double_crochet with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per side 11 half_double_crochet 19 double_crochet 2 fpdc 1 chain-2 space 10 sl-st in next st and into chain-2 space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space *skip next hidden st double_crochet in next 14 sts chain 1 skip next st puff st in next st chain 1 skip next st double_crochet in next 14 sts in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last corner group join to top of chain-3 with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per side 32 double_crochet 1 puff st 2 chain-1 sps 1 chain-2 space 5 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2020 all rights reserved 11 sl-st in next st and into chain-2 space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space *skip next hidden st double_crochet in next 15 sts double_crochet in chain-1 space fpdc around puff st double_crochet in chain-1 space double_crochet in next 16 sts in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last corner group join to top of chain-3 with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per side 37 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 chain-2 space 12 sl-st in next st and into chain-2 space chain 5 counts as double_crochet and chain 2 double_crochet in same space *bpdc around next 38 sts in chain-2 space double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last corner group join to 3rd chain fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 2 double_crochet 38 bpdc 1 chain-2 space the last thing to do is to give your square a slight block if you want to see more of my work then please visit my facebook page thank you for choosing my
